# riso Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-10-29

## Active Technologies

- Python 3.12 (uv toolchain), TypeScript 5.x targeting Node.js 20 LTS + uv-managed Python stack (pytest, jupyter, ruff, mypy, pylint, Shibuya/Sphinx), pnpm workspace with TypeScript, Fumadocs, FastAPI, Fastify, fastmcpv2 (001-build-riso-template)

## Project Structure

```text
src/
tests/
```

## Commands

cd src [ONLY COMMANDS FOR ACTIVE TECHNOLOGIES][ONLY COMMANDS FOR ACTIVE TECHNOLOGIES] pytest [ONLY COMMANDS FOR ACTIVE TECHNOLOGIES][ONLY COMMANDS FOR ACTIVE TECHNOLOGIES] ruff check .

## Code Style

Python 3.12 (uv toolchain), TypeScript 5.x targeting Node.js 20 LTS: Follow standard conventions

## Recent Changes

- 001-build-riso-template: Added Python 3.12 (uv toolchain), TypeScript 5.x targeting Node.js 20 LTS + uv-managed Python stack (pytest, jupyter, ruff, mypy, pylint, Shibuya/Sphinx), pnpm workspace with TypeScript, Fumadocs, FastAPI, Fastify, fastmcpv2

<!-- MANUAL ADDITIONS START -->
<!-- MANUAL ADDITIONS END -->
